Header.title: Expert Braiders, Just a Doorbell Away
Header.paragraph: We are your premier destination for mobile African hair braiding in Providence RI, Cranston RI, East Providence RI, Pawtucket RI, Warwick RI, and Woonsocket RI. We offer both salon and home visits.

About.paragraph: Liz here, your local expert in African hair braiding. I started braiding hair as a side hustle while studying at CCRI. Creative, proficient, and passionate, I quickly mastered the craft and even began teaching others about hair care and styling. For the past 10 years, I've been a successful braider in the greater Providence area, specializing in African braids. Growing up here, I initially pursued a career in healthcare, but eventually decided to combine my love for hair with my healthcare background to create Majestic Braids. I've always loved working with hair, and it's incredibly rewarding to know that my passion helps people feel confident with their braids hairstyles 2025. If you have searched for “hair braiding shops near me” you have found the best.
Why: Experienced: 10 years of braiding in Providence, at top braiding salons
Passionate: I love braiding, so you get top-quality care and attention to detail for your mobile brading needs.
Why2: Local: I know Providence and understand our community's hair needs.
Expert: My teaching background means I can help you maintain healthy hair and braids.

Services.name: Box Braids
Services.text: Individual braids that are sectioned off in a box-like pattern. They are a popular choice when searching for “box braids”.

Services.name: Cornrows
Services.text: Braids that are close to the scalp and can be styled in various patterns.

Services.name: Senegalese Twists
Services.text: Two-strand twists made with synthetic braiding hair. Perfect for those looking for “Senegalese twist hair”.

Services.name: Micro Braids
Services.text: Very small braids offering a lot of versatility.

Services.name: Faux Locs
Services.text: Braids that resemble dreadlocks, a great protective style.

Services.name: Weaves
Services.text: Hair extensions for added length and volume.

Testimonials.text: Liz is amazing! I've been going to her for years now, and my hair braiding always looks perfect. She's so fast and efficient, and she really cares about the health of my hair. Plus, she's just a lovely person to chat with. Highly recommend for anyone looking for hair braiding near me!
Testimonials.name: Maria S.

Testimonials.text: I was nervous about trying braids for the first time, but Liz made the whole experience so comfortable. She took the time to explain everything and gave me great advice on how to care for my hair. I'm so happy with the results! My braids are beautiful, and I feel so confident. If you are looking for braiding shops near me look no further.
Testimonials.name: Ashley J.

Testimonials.text: Majestic Braids is the best! Liz is a true artist. I always get compliments on my hair, and it's all thanks to her. Her prices are reasonable, and her shop is clean and welcoming. I wouldn't go anywhere else for African hair braiding near me or braiding salon services.
Testimonials.name: Keisha B.

Testimonials.text: Majestic Braids is the best! Liz is a true artist. I always get compliments on my hair, and it's all thanks to her. Her prices are reasonable, and her shop is clean and welcoming. I wouldn't go anywhere else.

Testimonials.text: I love that Liz is so knowledgeable about hair care. She gave me some great tips on how to keep my braids looking fresh and healthy. She's also very professional and always on time. I appreciate her attention to detail and her commitment to providing excellent service. She is the best at African hair braiding styles.
Testimonials.name: David R.

Testimonials.text: Five stars for Majestic Braids! Liz is fantastic. She's friendly, talented, and passionate about her work. I always leave her shop feeling like a million bucks. If you're looking for a skilled braider in Providence, look no further for mobile hair braiding salons near me!
Testimonials.name: Tiffany A.
